home.title: Make a change in our society with Make.org -
home.description: Finding solutions is easier when working together. Make.org helps you share ideas with forward-thinking people like you. Discover a democratic place where you can discuss, vote and submit your solutions on the big issues you care about.

cookie_modal.title: Express yourself on Make.org while respecting your privacy
cookie_modal.description: In an effort to further optimize our service and your experience, we seek your consent to the cookies we and our partners wish to use during your visit. You can change your preferences at any time on the cookie management page.

details.title: What cookies are we talking about?
details.technicals: Technical: cookies essential for the website to function.
details.preferences: Preference: cookies to enhance your experience while browsing the website.
details.statistics: Statistics: cookies to enrich the analysis of our citizen consultations in an aggregated way.
details.social_media: Social networks: cookies to help us maximize our impact through social networks.

technicals.secure: make secure : once you have logged into your citizen account on Make.org, this cookie ensures that this connection will be maintained while you are browsing the service.
technicals.expiration: make-secure-expiration : this cookie is used to detect your inactivity on the service in order to make this connection expire.

preferences.authentication: Google and Facebook authentication cookies: they enable registration and connection to your citizen account via these social networks.
preferences.session: make-session-id : this cookie is used to group all the actions you perform on the service into one session.
preferences.expiration: make-session-id-expiration : this cookie allows to display the notification that your session has expired (after 20 minutes) and will be reloaded.
preferences.user: make-user-id : this cookie identifies that you have already created a citizen account on Make.org and invites you to log in so that you can find all your actions in your citizen account.
preferences.cookie: make-cookie-preferences : this cookie will keep your preferences about the use of cookies on our service.

statistics.visitor: make-visitor-id : this cookie is used to track visits and revisits to our service in order to measure traffic in an anonymous and aggregated fashion. This tracking is not done at the individual level.
statistics.tracking: Facebook tracking cookie: it is used to collect behavioral data on the service for aggregate analysis to improve the service. It is also used to collect socio-demographic data (age, gender, region) in an aggregated way to enrich the analysis of the consultation.

social_media.facebook_pixel: Facebook pixel : it is used to optimize the performance of campaigns promoting consultations on Facebook in order to increase citizen participation.
social_media.twitter_pixel: Twitter pixel : it is used to optimize the performance of campaigns promoting consultations on Twitter in order to increase citizen participation.
social_media.facebook_sharing: Facebook sharing : allow the user to share content on his Facebook and Instagram accounts.
social_media.twitter_sharing: Twitter sharing : allow the user to share content on his Twitter account.
social_media.linkedin_sharing: LinkedIn sharing : allow the user to share content on his LinkedIn account.

followus.title: Learn more about us

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: Our methodology is based on citizens’ solutions collected and reviewed by our Moderation team. They are first submitted for validation with regard to their compliance with the Make.org guidelines, then classified according to a thematic tagging. Algorithms developed by Make.org teams then guarantee each validated solution an equal level of exposure, and organize a competition between them. Through this constant rotation, Make.org identifies the solutions that have the greatest consensus among citizens before analyzing them and grouping them into big ideas.

download.title: Download the full report
download.deprecated_contact: If you want to receive the full report on this consultation, contact us at this address :
download.contact: To receive the full report on this consultation, please contact us at this address :

top_ideas.title: Top emerging ideas, grouped into {{count}} themes
top_ideas.introduction: , The best citizen solutions are grouped into big ideas that structure the consultation. To classify these ideas, the Make.org algorithm takes into account the votes 'Agree' and 'Disagree' as well as the mentions 'Genius', 'Obvious', 'Irrelevant !' and 'Nonsense'.
top_ideas.title_plural: Top ideas is merged in {{count}} topics
top_ideas.deprecated_title: @@consultation.results.top_ideas.deprecated_title|fr:Le top des idées émergentes, regroupées en {{count}} thème
top_ideas.deprecated_title_plural: @@consultation.results.top_ideas.deprecated_title_plural|fr:Le top des idées émergentes, regroupées en {{count}} thèmes
top_ideas.deprecated_introduction: @@consultation.results.top_ideas.deprecated_introduction|fr:À leur arrivée sur la plateforme, les meilleures propositions citoyennes sont regroupées en grandes idées qui structurent la consultation. Pour classer ces idées, l’algorithme Make.org tient compte des votes « pour » et « contre » ainsi que des mentions « coup de cœur», « banalité », « surtout pas ! » et « réaliste ».

proposals.controversials_description: @@consultation.results.proposals.controversials_description|fr:Les idées “controversées” témoignent d’un clivage important au sein de la société : elles recueillent globalement autant d’adhésion forte que de net rejet.

highlights.progress_description: The more votes a solution receives, the more likely it is to become a real change in society.

participate.title: How to participate in this consultation ?
participate.description: We count on everyone's action to improve the common good. Therefore we need thousands of citizen solutions and opinions during our consultations.

citizen_account.title: Your citizen account on Make.org
citizen_account.description: Thanks to your personal account you have access to the results of your solutions and the records for your votes, as well as receiving the results of the consultations. By registering with us, you will be informed by email of the next citizen consultations and you will be invited to our participative events.

submit.title: Write a solution
submit.description: Tell your ideas with as many people as possible. Each proposal will be studied before being put to the vote of the citizens.

interact.title: React to the solutions
interact.description: Solutions define the stakes of a consultation: express yourself to determine what the citizen priorities are.

disclaimer.title: Information
disclaimer.subtitle_first: How to give your opinion on a citizen idea?
disclaimer.description_first: You can vote for any idea with ("Agree", "Disagree" or "Neutral") along with a term to specify your thoughts. This will generate three new fields, in which you can detail your three key measures and/or explain your opinion.
disclaimer.description_second: If you want to edit your measures after clicking "Publish", send us an email at {{mailto}}
disclaimer.subtitle_second: How can I modify my answers ?

hero.title: Together, we can change society for the better
hero.description: Give your opinion on social issues that matter to you by voting on our consultations. Together - citizens, organizations, companies - let's set our priorities to make a change through concrete actions!

partnership.title: Collaborate with Make.org
partnership.subtitle: Become partner
partnership.description:
In all our projects, we involve companies, associations and institutions to accelerate collaboration.
We also permit these organisations to create their own consultation.

no_cookies.title: Looks like your cookies are deactivated.
no_cookies.first_paragraph: We cannot let you access the site because we use cookies to ensure the quality of our service.
no_cookies.second_paragraph: In order to optimize your navigation on Make.org, we invite you to allow cookies on this browser or to use another one. To allow cookies on your browser, go to the menu and then to the settings.
no_cookies.information: Click on this link to learn more about how to manage your cookies:
no_cookies.thanks: Thank you for your understanding and see you soon!
no_cookies.footer: Make.org is a civic platform that foster social progress by leveraging citizens' ideas. To find out more about our mission, discover notre actualité.

contact.paragraph: Have an suggestion or want to report a bug? Feel free to send us an email:

legal.title: Legal mentions
legal.make_infos: Website's publisher: MAKE.ORG, Société par Actions Simplifiées au capital de 1000 euros, having its headquarters at 4 rue René Villermé, 75011, PARIS, registered with the RCS of PARIS under the number 820 016 095 (here after 'MAKE.ORG').

intro.title: What is a cookie?
intro.first_paragraph: A cookie is a small computer file that can be deposited and read when an Internet user visits a website or a mobile application, regardless of the type of terminal used (computer, smartphone, etc.).
intro.second_paragraph: Some cookies are essential to the proper functioning of the websites or applications; others contribute to optimizing the performance of the website or to improving the experience of Internet users.

use.title: How do we use cookies?
use.first_paragraph: When you connect to our website, cookies are deposited on your terminal to improve your experience, increase the performance of our website and optimize our consultations.
use.second_paragraph: The information contained in the cookies is not intended to identify you personally and is never used for any purpose other than those stated below.

partners.title: Who are our partners ?
partners.intro: In addition to the cookies created and managed by Make, cookies are also placed on our website by the following partners:

details.title: Which cookies do we use?
details.intro: The cookies deposited on our website are the following:

technicals.name: Technical cookies:
technicals.description: these cookies are necessary for the functioning of the website and cannot be disabled. You can set your browser to block or be informed of the existence of these cookies, but some parts of our website may be affected. These cookies are not intended to identify you personally.
technicals.secure: make-secure : once you have logged in to your citizen account on Make.org, this cookie ensures that this connection will be maintained while you browse the service.
technicals.secure-expiration: make-secure-expiration: this cookie is used to detect your inactivity on the service in order to expire this connection.

preferences.name: Preference cookies:
preferences.description: these cookies are used to remember your preferences on our website and thus enhance your browsing experience. You can set your browser to block or be notified of the existence of these cookies, but some parts of our website may be affected. These cookies are not intended to identify you personally.
preferences.google-connect: Google connect : this cookie allows you to register and connect to your citizen account.
preferences.facebook-connect: Facebook connect : this cookie allows you to register and connect to your citizen account.
preferences.session-id: make-session-id : this cookie is used to group all the actions you perform on the website into one session.
preferences.session-id-expiration: make-session-id-expiration : this cookie is used to notify you that your session has expired (after 20 minutes) and will be reloaded.
preferences.user-id: make-user-id : this cookie will identify you after you have logged in to a personal space on Make.org. It will be used to invite you to reconnect by pre-filling in your identifier.
preferences.cookie-preferences: make-cookie-preferences : this cookie will keep your preferences about the use of cookies on our service.

statistics.name: Statistics cookies:
statistics.description: these cookies are intended to analyze visits to our website and improve its performance. All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore anonymized. If you do not accept these cookies, we will not be informed of your revisit.
statistics.visitor-id: make-visitor-id: this cookie is used to identify a unique visitor.
statistics.visitor-created-at: make-visitor-created-at : this cookie is used to obtain the date of the first visit on the platform.
statistics.facebook-tracking: Facebook tracking cookie : this cookie allows us to generate statistics on the number of visitors to our website in order to improve our website and to enrich the analysis of our consultations.

social.name: "Social network" cookies:
social.description: these cookies, activated by third parties, allow you to share the content of our website on social networks and thus help us optimize our impact. If you do not consent to the placement of these cookies, you may not be able to benefit from these sharing tools.
social.facebook_tracking: Facebook pixel : his cookie is used to optimize the performance of campaigns promoting Facebook consultations in order to increase citizen participation.
social.twitter_tracking: Twitter pixel : his cookie is used to optimize the performance of campaigns promoting Twitter consultations in order to increase citizen participation.
social.facebook_sharing: Facebook sharing : this cookie allows the user to share content on their Facebook and Instagram accounts and improve the usability of our consultations.
social.twitter_sharing: Twitter sharing : this cookie allows the user to share content on their Twitter account and improve the usability of our consultations.
social.linkedin_sharing: LinkedIn sharing : this cookie allows the user to share content on their LinkedIn account and improve the usability of our consultations.

legal_consent.title: Legal permission
legal_consent.subtitle: We need one of your parent's permission
legal_consent.description: We need both permissions to allow you to navigate on this website. Then, you will express yourself on our citizen plateform !
legal_consent.minor_consent: I agree Make.org to use my personal data.
legal_consent.parental_consent: As a representative of parental authority, I consent to the processing of my child personal data by Make.org.
